sentences.en: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.cn: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.en: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.cn: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.en: "Do you think that made much of a difference to the family?"—"I think so."
sentences.cn: “你认为那样给全家带来了很大变化吗？”—“我觉得是。”

sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.cn: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
sentences.cn: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

sentences.en: He bowled so well that we won two matches.
sentences.cn: 他的球投得极棒，使我们赢下了两场比赛。

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: he sat down without so much as a word to anyone.
sentences.cn: 他坐下来甚至没和任何人说一个字。

sentences.en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
sentences.cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: I thought, "Here'ssomeone who'll understand me." So I wrote to her.
sentences.cn: 我想：“这个人会理解我的。”于是开始给她写信。

sentences.en: I was feeling hungry, so I made myself a sandwich.
sentences.cn: 我感到饿了，所以就做了个三明治吃。

sentences.en: I wasn't successful, so they looked down on me.
sentences.cn: 我一无所成，所以他们瞧不起我。

sentences.en: In the dark my sense of hearing becomes so acute.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中我的听觉变得异常灵敏。

sentences.en: it's just so much ideological cant.
sentences.cn: 这些太多都是流于空谈的假话。

sentences.en: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

sentences.en: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.cn: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

sentences.en: she had put her hair up so as to look older.
sentences.cn: 她把头发盘起来以便让自己看起来更成熟些。

sentences.en: so many hours at such-and-such a speed.
sentences.cn: 以这种速度要那么多小时呢。

sentences.en: so much for that idea!.
sentences.cn: 那个主意不行。

sentences.en: So much for the melodic line. We now turn our attention to the accompaniment.
sentences.cn: 关于主旋律就到此为止吧，我们现在把注意力转移到伴奏上。

sentences.en: So, how was school today?
sentences.cn: 噢，今天上学怎么样？

sentences.en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
sentences.cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: the novel was not so much unfinished as unfinishable.
sentences.cn: 这部小说与其说未完成，还不如说根本就完成不了。

sentences.en: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.cn: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.en: there is only so much you can do to protect yourself.
sentences.cn: 你为保护自己所能做的只有这么多了。

sentences.en: there is only so much you can do to protect yourself.
sentences.cn: 你为保护自己所能做的只有这么多了。

sentences.en: these savouries include cheeses, cold meats, and so on.
sentences.cn: 这些开胃食品包括干酪，冷肉等等。

sentences.en: Well, so much for the producers. But what of the con-sumers?
sentences.cn: 好吧，关于生产商就讲这么多，那关于消费者呢？

words.tran_cn: 极端地,非常地,相当大地

phrases.tran_cn: 如果是这样的话；要是这样
更是这样， 尤其如此
[表示接受、顺从用语]就这样吧
这么；非常；达到这种程度
[表示不成功或没用]不过如此

trans.tran_en: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated
used to get someone’s attention, especially in order to ask them a question
